attributes.action: Ensure the NHS is not part of any trade agreement with the US
attributes.additional_details: The NHS is there for us all “from the cradle to the grave.” We should all be proud of what it gives in spite of the hardships it suffers. We should stand behind it, just as it has stood behind us for all of these years.
attributes.background: Regarding the announcement made recently that the NHS is “on the table” for a trade agreement with the US, I feel strongly that this is not acceptable and that our NHS is not a bargaining chip to be used just so the UK has at least one country to trade with after Brexit.
